string.text: Professor, they say you can create transmutes. Is that true?

Indeed, I know the procedure and I manipulate with artifacts and transmutes from time to time, but it is a VERY expensive process, do you understand? The transmutes are very rare and expensive to be considered toys! But I could certainly create them for you, if you manage to bring the necessary components and a certain sum of money, of course. Take a look at what I can propose:

"Sky". Greatly increases the muscle tone of the bearer, boosting tear, rupture and hit resistance of the tissues. Is highly radioactive, though.
Preparation cost: 35'000 rub. Necessary ingredients: "Night Star", "Moonlight", "Battery".

"TdW". The name has been given by our German colleagues, who had been the first to create it. Heightens the psi-emission immunity.
Preparation cost: 55'000 rub. Necessary ingredients: "Moonlight", flesh's eye.

"Capricorn horn". Due to its unique attributes, it grants additional protection against bullets and blast waves.
Preparation cost: 100'000 rub. Necessary ingredients: "Night Star", "Mama's Beads", "Gravi", "Droplets".

"Hermes". A double-faced artifact: on one hand, it boosts the bearer's fatigue, on the other - incinerates his tissues.
Preparation cost: 35'000 rub. Necessary ingredients: "Moonlight", "Plasma Cactus", "Slime".

"Sponge". Protects against radiation and excessive temperatures.
Preparation cost: 75'000 rub. Necessary ingredients: "Mica", "Shell", "Fireball".

"Honeycomb". Neutralizes the negative influence of various toxins on human organism.
Preparation cost: 20'000 rub. Necessary ingredients: "Pellicle", "Wrenched".

"Red Star". Promotes faster health restore and wound healing.
Preparation cost: 150'000 rub. Necessary ingredients: "Soul", "Mica", bloodsucker's tissues pattern.

"Eye". Boosts wound healing, but reduces the bearer's resistance to psionic influence. This artifact has a unique ability: when placed on the owner's body, it keeps most snorks and burers from attacking.
Preparation cost: 85'000 rub. Necessary ingredients: "Goldfish", "Mica", controller's hand.
Professor, may I request more transmutes from you, please?
Of course, young man, you are always welcome! What exactly are you interested in?
The "Hermes". I'm sick and tired of dragging myself about the entire Zone in full marching order.
The "Sponge". Or else I either start to glow very soon, or become a drunkard.
The "Red Star". I look like a mummy because of all those bandages.
Whoops, I haven't got enough money. See you later, Professor.
Here you are, young man, the requested transmute is ready!
Wow! I hope it's worth the money!
Sure, Marked One! Luckily, I've got plenty of free time right now.
